title: HELP ME PLS
body:
I cant start lol client... when i want to update lol,i get window with some ,,bug report,, 
And I download full game to another PC,and copy to this one,and i have same problem... 

My PC config:
AMD Phenom II X2 555 procesor 3.2 GHz
2.0 Gb RAM memory
NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT
Windows 7 Ultimate 32 bit

{{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
It sounds like a bugsplat, so this is likely caused by driver or hardware issues that prevent the patcher from properly interacting with your computer. We've gathered the most common solutions in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I recommend starting with those steps.

Let me know if you have any more issues with this after working through that guide.
